mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lockwood, Jonathan H. to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lockwood, Jonathan H.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov F.H. Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Nov 16 1861. By Telegraph from Romney 16 1861. Capt Moore has fifty 50 men at Grafton. Can you furnish them blankets and clothing J.H. Lockwood Maj Comdg 7th Regt 14z56pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lockwood, Jonathan H.
Romney, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
